metadata.synopsis: Reaction AD to any other guard or Tusgront being killed - mostly to cover edge cases so players know that they'll be attacked on sight. (Only one will play, but all the guards need them incase the player wipes anywhere from 1 to all-bar-one out)

1.speaker: Skeeve Stabwell
1.text: Be ready. Whoever did this is lurking nearby.
1.context: NodeContext: Guarded, watching out for player who is hiding nearby
